name: An Tam monastery zen trip for Mirja
description:
To be organized recently from August of 2011 up to now, there have been 100 trips with more than 1500 arrivals, with support from monks and nuns in Zen Monastery, the trip has received lots of positive comments from people. After the first tour to Truc Lam Zen Monastery, so many people has returned to daily life and still consider this trip to be their useful monthly activity.

Departure time: 7a.m Saturday of the second and fourth week of every month.

Duration: 2 days 1 night Meditation Practice.

Place: An Tam & Tay Thien Zen Monastery, Dai Dinh commune, Tam Dao dist, Vinh Phuc province, Vietnam.
